text.data: Chapter 4 Full of Regret[end]M
Matelite: [character][0x1]![end]M
Matelite: I, Matelite, captain of the knights of Kahna, have arrived![end]T
Taicho: I, Taicho of the knights of Mahal, have also come![end]M
Matelite: Alright, [character][0x1]! Do your worst![end]S
Soldier: !!![end][0x0]
[character][0x1]... My heart is full of regret. I had hoped we would finally find you...[end]M
Matelite: Here comes the commander, taking his idle time! Hurry up, [character][0x1]![end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1] was also tortured... That image will not do![end]A
A distant, pleasant fragrance...[end]T
Taicho: Hurry and introduce me to [character][0x1]![end][0x0]
Taicho: Do it however you like, [character][0x1]![end]I
I cannot believe that [character][0x1] would torture somebody...[end]S
Sendak: [0x2a]gasp[0x2a] [0x2a]pant[0x2a] I will wait here...[end]L
Lukia: There must be hordes of enemies outside. Are your battle preparations complete? Wait! Let's go![end1]M
Matelite: Hey! Stop shouting![end]L
Lukia: I'll wait here too. Sendak looks like he got a little too enthusiastic.[end]L
Lukia: Rush is chasing after a Granbelos soldier.[end]R
Rush: Sorry... he got away.[end]R
Rush: But I brought this guy with me.[end]R
Rush: I see.[end][0x0]
Battlefield salesman: Hello![end]
Show me weapons. Show me armor. Show me items.[end1]U
Uhehehehe... Princess... Hee hee hee...[end]S
Soldier: Sorry, General Zomberd! I was daydreaming![end]S
Soldier: Who are you?![end]S
Soldier: The Resistance?! Please, spare my life![end]S
Soldier: What are you going to do me? You're... not gonna torture me, are you? Torture it is! I can't do something like that![end1]A
Aah! Stop! I don't like being hurt![end]R
Rush: Screw that![end][0x0]

Whew... ......
Oh no! You're just toying with me! You're going to, after all![end]M
Matelite: What is this? Where is [character][0x1]?![end]R
Rush: She isn't here. [character][0x1] is gonna ask this guy about her by torturing him.[end]T
Taicho: Excellent idea![end]S
Soldier: Please stop! I'll talk! I'll talk! Princess [character][0x1] was taken with Emperor Sauzer![end]M
Matelite: But WHERE TO?![end]S
Soldier: To the forest to the north! I don't know the details![end]M
Matelite: You don't know the details? Lying won't do you any good.[end]M
Matelite: Fine. I'll just have to personally show him some real torture.[end]R
Rush: Oh no! He's going to call for his friends![end]R
Rush: Those Granbelos jerks! Sticking [character][0x1] in a place like this![end]R
Rush: Something seems strange up ahead! What should we do, [character][0x1]? You go on ahead! Come back later![end1]R
Rush: [0x24]Oh, Rush! You came to save me![0x22] And then I'll hold her tightly in my arms! Sorry, [character][0x1]. Come back later![end]R

Rush: You just want her all for yourself, don't you?!
[0x24]Oh, [character][0x1]! You came to save me! I'm so happy![0x22] she'll say, then you'll hold each other's hands... That role is mine![end]R
Rush: She isn't here...[end]R
Rush: I wonder what this guy knows?[end]B
Bikkebakke: I brought the dragons, but it's a little crowded here.[end]H
Hey! What happened to, [0x24]Rush... Thank you...[0x22]!?[end]R
Rush: [character][0x1]! Where're you going?![end][end]
